Plot: The film Cowboys is a comedy based on a Croatian hit theater play. It is a story of eight outsiders who trying to create a theater play while breaking every rule of theater craft. ...
Title: Cowboys
Writer: Sasa Anocic (original play), Tomislav Mrsic (screenplay), Tomislav Mrsic
Actors: Sasa Anocic, Zivko Anocic, Matija Antolic, Hrvoje Barisic
